sources.title: By Love Possessed (1961) Lana Turner · Efrem Zimbalist jr.
sources.description: The broken marriages of two lawyers are repaired when one of the couple's sons goes on trial for alleged rape.   Set in autumnal New England, this film aims to reveal the fractures behind the facade of middle-class respectability.

metadata.Plot: Neurotic woman engages in an affair with the law partner of her impotent husband.
metadata.Writer: Charles Schnee, James Gould Cozzens, Ketti Frings
metadata.Actors: Lana Turner, Jason Robards, Efrem Zimbalist Jr.
